ValidationRule.description: This validation rule is to make sure user clicks on button to check Business Rules
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(AND(Ready_to_Convert__c == false, ISPICKVAL( Business_Rules_Check__c , 'Green')),ISPICKVAL( Business_Rules_Check__c , 'Grey' )), ISPICKVAL( Upsell_Status__c , 'Convert') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please click on button "Verify Proposal" before proceeding for conversion.
